Choose an additional cost as you cast this spell [i](choose only one)[/i]–
+ {B} – Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
+ {1}{B}{B} – Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
+ {4}{B} – Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
